description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: ＧＥ～グッドエンディング～

description.en:
Utsumi is your everyday student. He is also a boy that has always had a strong sense of what is right in the world. With nothing but innocence and a mind that longs for his "significant other," Utsumi takes on one of the toughest subjects: love. With the help of the devious and mysterious Kurokawa Yuki, will Utsumi learn how to be fortunate in the game of love? Only through the ups and downs of real life, and the assistance of his friends, will Utsumi be able to take a bite out of life and learn just what love is.

- Alternative English: [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/ge-good-ending)

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/), [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/e_R0002)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

altTitles.ja: 他校のボーイッシュ彼女

description.en: Daichi and Akira have been childhood friends forever but have only started dating recently. While Akira is very much a tomboy, there are some parts of her that are surprisingly girly?

As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

altTitles.ja: 日本へようこそエルフさん。

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

altTitles.th: ขอต้อนรับสู่ญี่ปุ่นนะ คุณเอลฟ์

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với Nhật Bản, Elf san!

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.  
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!  

- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫【ヴァンパイア】美夕 朔
吸血姫美夕 朔

description.en: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

altTitles.ja: 男塾外伝 赤石剛次

description.en: A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Akashi Gouji.

A short story featuring Robots and Big Monsters that takes place in the "Modern MoGal" Universe.  
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.

title.en: Yopparai Touzoku, Dorei no Shoujo wo Kau

altTitles.ja: 酔っぱらい盗賊、奴隷の少女を買う

altTitles.en: A Drunk Thief Bought a Slave Girl

altTitles.id: Thief Pemabuk yang Membeli Budak Gadis

altTitles.es-la: Un Ladrón Borracho que Compró una Esclava

description.en:
A hangover leads to a shared life between a thief and a slave girl.
 
Harris is an adventurer who works as a thief and scout, a job that is often shunned due to poor reputation.
 
One day he gets drunk and buys a slave girl, Tiana. Tiana, who had been treated badly and not given enough food until then, comes to adore Harris, who treats her kindly, as her master. Harris, who had been hoping that Tiana would grow up to be a beautiful woman, is gradually drawn to her because of her innocence.
 
Harris' life changes drastically when he begins living with Tiana: warm meals, freshly washed clothes, and interaction with the townspeople who had never come close to him before. On the other hand, he finds himself in more and more troublesome situations, will he manages to escape from them with his skill and tact...?
 
This is the story of the "rebirth" of a shabby thief, which begins with an encounter with a slave girl.

title.en: Lies of the Sheriff Evans: Dead or Love

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoankan Evans no Uso - Dead or Love

altTitles.ja: 保安官エヴァンスの嘘
保安官エヴァンスの嘘 ～DEAD OR LOVE～

description.en: The story follows lawman Elmore Evans, who despite being one of the most amazing gunslingers in the West can't get rid of his bad luck in his romantic life.
description.ru: Шериф Элмор Эванс, слывущий на Диком Западе искусным стрелком, вечно терпит поражение в любви.

title.en: Vignette Witch! ~Joshi-ka no Mahou to Isekai Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: ヴィネット・ウィッチ！～女子化の魔法と異世界生活～

altTitles.en: Vignette Witch! - Isekai Life with Feminization Magic

description.en:
Recently, Hama Konpachi has been having nightmares about a ribbon growing out of his chest. That's not to mention all the strangers who mistake him for a girl, and the nickname "princess" that his classmates use. His childhood friend Shintarou says he worries too much about his femininity, but Konpachi just can't abandon his wish.  "I need to become a big, strong boy as soon as possible!"

But then one day, he's pulled into a strange book in the library and meets Marianne, the self proclaimed "strongest witch in history." She makes him an offer. "Will you become my pupil?" Magic is something that can only be used by "maidens," but somehow the male Konpachi has the potential?

But before Marianne can finish speaking, that ribbon from his dream begins growing and wraps Konpachi up! And when the ribbon comes undone, Konpachi has become... a girl?

Can Konpachi use his feminization magic to escape from the Vignette in this gender-bending fantasy story?
description.ja: 羽間コンパチは最近、胸にリボンが生えた夢を見る。それでなくても周りからは女の子に見られ、同級生からは「姫」なんて呼び名もつけられる乙女な見た目。幼なじみの慎太郎は気にしすぎだと言って取り合わない。コンパチは「一日も早くごっつい男子になりたい」という願いを持っている。そんなある日、図書館で見つけた不思議な本に引き込まれ、自称「史上最強の魔女」だというマリアンヌに出会う。彼女はコンパチに「弟子にならない？」と言ってきた。本来魔法の資質は「乙女」にしかないと言われているが、なぜか男のコンパチにはあるという。そんなマリアンヌの言葉も終わらないうちに、夢で見たリボンが胸から生えてコンパチを包む。そのリボンが解けると、そこには女体化したコンパチが…！

altTitles.ja: ビビッド・モンスターズ・クロニクル

description.en: In order to achieve her goal Yumeko Makino starts the game "Vivid Monsters Chronicle." This manga follows her and her friends who she meets along the way, in game and in real life.
description.ja: とある目的のため、ネットゲーム『ビビッド・モンスターズ・クロニクル』（通称：ビビモン）を始めた夢子。ゲーム内で偶然助けてくれた女の子がとても内気なクラスメイトで…!?個性豊かなキャラクター達がゲームの内外で心を通じ合わせる『ビビモン』の世界へ、いざ！

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ja: 親子3人で幸せな家庭を築いていた流（ながれ）一家。だが、息子の桐崇は学校でひそかに虐めにあっていた。そして起きてしまったある事件をきっかけに、息子を想う母の愛が暴走していく――。
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

altTitles.ja: 戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ

description.en:
This story takes place in a world made up of floating islands of various sizes, where two types of races, "Caninu" and "Felineko" live.

Malt, a caninu boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei on their grandparents' farm in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, their village is suddenly attacked by the Berman Empire, and is burnt to the ground overnight. "How could something like this happen..." Malt and his friends were confused, then a mysterious voice called out from the radio...! ?

A group of children caught in the flames of war ride the mysterious giant tank ``Taranis'' and fight to save their families!
description.ja:
子どもたちは戦火の中、復讐を誓うー

“戦争×復讐×ケモノ”をテーマにしたドラマティックシュミレーションRPG『戦場のフーガ』の公式コミカライズ作品『戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ』！漫画執筆は足立たかふみ氏（代表作：『D・Mファイター焔』や『メタルファイト ベイブレード』など）が担当。

＜あらすじ＞
「イヌヒト」と「ネコヒト」という2種類の種族が暮らす、大小様々な浮島からなる世界――浮遊大陸。
イヌヒトの少年マルトは、辺境にあるプチ・モナ村でヒツウシ飼いをしながら妹のメイと穏やかに暮らしていた。ある日突然、北東の国「ベルマン帝国」から村が襲撃され、一夜にして戦火に焼け落ちる。どうしてこんなことに……混乱するマルトたちにラジオから謎の声が―――！？

戦火に巻き込まれたこどもたちは連れ去られた家族を取り戻すため、謎の巨大戦車『タラニス』に乗り込む！

単行本だけの付録として足立たかふみ氏の設定画やゲームソフト『戦場のフーガ』総監督であり株式会社サイバーコネクトツー代表取締役 松山洋による開発ブログも収録。

altTitles.ja: 天国大魔境

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.ja: 美しい壁に囲まれた世界で暮らす子供たち。少年・トキオはある日、「外の外に行きたいですか？」というメッセージを受け取る。一方、外では、マルとおねえちゃんがサバイバル生活をしながら、天国を求めて、魔境となった世界を旅している。未来の日本を「あね散歩」。
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

altTitles.ms: Alya yang duduk di sebelah saya terkadang membisikkan kata manis dalam bahasa Rusia
اليا يڠ دودوق دسبله ساي ترکادڠ ممبيسيقکن کات مانيس دالم بهاس روسيا

altTitles.es: Alya a veces me susurra en ruso

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

アンデッドアンラック カラー版

Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

陽下さんちの3姉妹

A slightly erotic home love comedy that unfolds under the roof of the Yoshita family!  
  
The eldest daughter, Juri, wears a swimsuit at home. The second daughter, Minori, has big natural breasts. The third daughter, Anri, loves reptiles. An adolescent boy who is an idol otaku becomes a sibling with these three girls. Under the roof of the Yoshita family, another naughty incident occurs today! [Translated by DeepL]

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

title.en: The Most Notorious "Talker" Runs the World's Greatest Clan

altTitles.ja: 最凶の支援職【話術士】である俺は世界最強クランを従える

altTitles.en: I'm the Most Evil Support Class【Talker】and I'll Subdue the Strongest Clan in the World

altTitles.vi: "Thánh Ngôn" khét tiếng nhất là người điều hành Clan vĩ đại nhất thế giới

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou no Shien-shoku "Wajutsushi" Dearu Ore wa Sekai Saikyou Kuran wo Shitagaeru

altTitles.es-la: Soy el Talker más Despiadado y Dominaré al Clan más Fuerte del Mundo

altTitles.vi: Tôi Là Thoại Thuật Sư Hỗ Trợ Cực Ác Dẫn Dắt Gia Tộc Mạnh Nhất Thế Giới

description.en:
Noel, a youth who admires his grandfather, who was hailed as a hero, and aspires to be the strongest Seeker. But his Job that appeared in the appraisal, was the support class Talker.

Talker is a peaky job with the weakest individual abilities. A job that could never become the strongest.

"If I create the strongest clan and become the clan master, then I’ll essentially be the strongest."

Thinking that, Noel worked hard persistently to fulfil his ambition. On the other hand, the merciless methods he employed for the sake of his ambition were acknowledged by everyone as the path of "evil." However, Noel’s distinct talent attracted many powerful people and they began to gather under him…

This is the story of how the most evil Talker, who seeks to be the strongest, subdues his allies and creates the strongest clan in the world.
description.vi: Đây là hành trình vươn tới đỉnh cao giới truy thủ của kẻ sinh ra mang trong mình một trong những chức nghiệp được đánh giá là yếu nhất - Noel Stollen.
description.es-la:
Noel, un joven que admira a su abuelo, que fue aclamado como un gran héroe, aspira a ser un buscador fuerte como él. Pero el trabajo que apareció en su evaluación, fue la clase de soporte “Talker” (Orador).

Talker es un trabajo con las habilidades individuales más débiles. Un trabajo que nunca podría convertirse en el más fuerte.

「Si creo el clan más fuerte y me convierto en el líder del clan, entonces esencialmente seré el más fuerte」

Pensando eso, y gracias al apoyo de su abuelo, Noel trabajó y entrenó arduamente por años con el objetivo de cumplir su ambición. Por otro lado, los métodos crueles que empleó por el bien de su ambición fueron reconocidos como inhumanos. Sin embargo, el talento distintivo de Noel atrajo a muchas personas poderosas y comenzaron a reunirse debajo de él...

Esta es la historia del Talker más despiadado que busca ser el más fuerte, forjando aliados para crear el clan más fuerte del mundo.

altTitles.ja: Haisu Koa Gaaru Dasshu
Hi Score Girl DASH
ハイスコアガールDASH

description.en: The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.
description.es-la: Año 2007, Hidaka Koharu ahora es maestra de secundaria y a punto de alcanzar los 30 años. Sin novio y sin perspectivas para el futuro. Balanceándose entre el trabajo y la búsqueda de matrimonio, el corazón de esta chica madura es como un Kikouken.

description.en: Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.

altTitles.ja: りーちゃん

description.en:
Due to work, Tatsu moves back into his parents' house; soon after that, he encounters a young woman who turns out to be Ri-chan, the little girl he used to play together with in his childhood. However, this girl he reunited with has somehow become very different from the cheerful childhood friend in his memories...

---

description.ja:
「太陽のような笑顔を、もう一度見たい」

「ピアノ捨てちゃった。もう音が出ないから」

地元に帰ってきた芦原辰巳（たつ兄ィ）は隣の家の少女・戸部りり（りーちゃん）と久々の再会を果たす。
ピアノが大好きでよく笑う子だったりーちゃんは、金髪ピアスで別人のようになっていた。
オドオドとしたりーちゃんだったが、変わらないたつ兄ィの優しさに、距離は徐々に縮まり――。

SNSで話題の、恋と絆と再生の物語がついに書籍化！
描き下ろしエピソード『その後』も収録！

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

description.en:
Shoto Kazama, a boy who has never been able to win at card games because of his habit of giving up on things easily, enters the immersive world of Digimon Liberator through the invitation of his childhood friend, Arisa Kinosaki.

The game allows players to engage in highly realistic card battles. At first, Shoto is hesitant towards it, but through his engrossing encounters with the Digimon there, he becomes a fan of the game.

Encounters with wild Digimon such as Pteromon and battles with NPCs who have gone rogue. These various happenings set the wheels of fate in motion for Shoto and his companions.

This is a story about Digimon, and the world.
description.ja:
諦め癖がついて中々カードバトルに勝てない少年・風真照人は、幼馴染みの城之崎有紗の誘いでフルダイブゲーム〝デジモンリベレイター〟の世界へと足を踏み入れた。

メタバース空間・ラクーナで臨場感溢れるカードバトルを楽しむことが出来るリベレイター。このゲームに最初は抵抗があった照人だったが、リアルなデジモンとの触れ合いを通じて次第に夢中になっていく。

そして、野生のデジモン・プテロモン達との出会い。暴走するNPCとのバトル。様々な出会いが、照人達の運命の歯車を大きく動かしていく。

これは〝デジモン〟と〝世界〟を巡る物語だ。

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

Housekeeper of the Hundred Blossom Palace: Novice Court Lady Resolves the Inner Palace Intrigues

百花宮のお掃除係～転生した新米宮女、後宮のお悩み解決します。

description.en:
"You, that's His Majesty the Emperor, you know?!"

"Is that more important than a steamed bun?"

Yui Mei has two secrets. First, she retained the memories of her past life. Second, it is highly probable that she is a daughter of the Sai Kingdom’s Emperor.
As a certified die-hard fan of Chinese dramas in her past life, she willingly participated in the court lady selection just for the sake of seeing the imperial harem in the flesh.

description.en: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

description.en:
Choose the world or choose her. 

Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. 

However, that was a story of his past life. 

In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.
description.ja:
世界を選ぶか、彼女を選ぶか。

平凡な高校生・白石護道には『秘密』があった。それは前世の記憶を持っていること。こことは違う別の世界で、人類を救った『英雄』だった。

とはいえ、あくまで前世の話。

今世ではごく普通の学生生活――のはずだったが、転入してきた少女・椎名麻衣の出現で日々は一変する。
description.vi:
Shiraishi Godou, một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường đang có một "Bí mật". Đó là cậu vẫn còn ký ức của tiền thế.
Ở một thế giới khác, Godou đã từng là "Anh hùng" giải cứu nhân loại. Tuy là vậy, nhưng đó là chuyện của tiền thế. Ở thế giới hiện tại, cậu chắc là đang trải qua quãng đời học sinh bình thường, vậy mà sự xuất hiện của cô thiếu nữ vừa chuyển trường đến. Shiina Mai đã làm những ngày yên bình của cậu hoàn toàn thay đổi
description.pt-br: O estudante comum de ensino médio Shiraishi Godo guardava um "segredo", ele possuía memórias de uma vida passada. Em um mundo diferente deste, ele foi um "herói" que salvou a humanidade. Mas isso era uma história de sua vida passada. Nesta vida, Godo deveria ter uma vida escolar comum. Isso até a chegada da nova aluna Mai Shiina, que virou tudo de cabeça para baixo. Ela não era apenas uma aluna transferida. Mai era a reencarnação de Celis, a Feiticeira da Calamidade, sua mortal inimiga de vidas passadas. E ela estava lá, não por vingança, mas por algo mais — algo que mudaria o curso da vida de Godo mais uma vez. Agora, ele deve navegar pelas complexidades de suas memórias reencarnadas, sua crescente conexão com Mai e a escolha impossível entre uma vida pacífica e uma cheia de caos mágico.

description.de:
Von dem Ersteller von be***l***iebten Ser***i***en wie ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto und Detergent kommt die Serie Test, eine preisgekrönte rom***a***ntische Komödie über einen Highschoo***l***-Waffenmeister namens Yugi, der die ganze We***l***t bereist und alle Life Notes sammelt, damit er eines Tages die Leiche seines Bruders bergen kann, nachdem er das Taboo erfüllt hat, den Titan, den wir an dem Tag mit seinem Stand gesehen haben, zu one-punchen und zum Nokage-Piratenkönig zu werden -datteba***y***o. Schauen Sie zu, wie er mit seinem Onii-Chan und generischen ***H***arem Mädchen durch das He***i***lige Reich von Bri***t***annia streift, während sie alle Widrigkeiten mit der Kraft der Freundschaft, ***L***iebe und... (warum knall***e***n sie sich nicht einfach gegenseitig.) In diesem Epos in Spielfilmlänge, was das von Gilgamesch und der Ilias konku***r***riert, werden wir die Mentalität und Soziologie dieser gesellschaftlichen Bedrohungen erforschen, während sie die Erde in ihrem nie stillbaren Durst nach Imoutos verwüsten.

Rezensenten geben dieser Serie eine 10/10 für die unkonventionelle Darstellung des Magical Girl Genre.
Nominiert für die 1. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den schlechtesten Manga des Jahres.
Gewinner der 2. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den besten Manga des Jahres.
Der beste Manga aller Zeiten, wie Meichiro Noda feststellte.

---

**Hinweis:** Bitte fügen Sie *KEINE* Genre hinzu, oder der Test Manga wird die Suche verschmutzen. Weil dieser Manga die reinste Form aller Manga ist [Der Plural von Manga ist Manga].
**Fun fact:** Im Jahr 127, als dieser Manga ursprünglich veröffentlicht wurde, hieß er "Taest", aber wurde wegen den amerikanischen Druckkosten pro Buchstabe zu "Test" verkürzt.

description.en:
From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto, ***a***nd Detergent, comes the series Test, an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes, so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Ho***l***y ***E***mpi***r***e of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship, love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  Best manga ever written, as stated by meichiro noda

---

**Note:** Please do *NOT* add genres or Test will pollute genre searches. Because this manga is the most purest form of any manga [The plural of manga is manga]
**Fun fact:** In the year 127, when this manga was originally released, it used to be called Taest, but because of American per/letter printing costs it was shortened to Test.

description.en:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
description.fr:
Yeon-woo avait un frère jumeau qui a disparu il y a cinq ans. Un jour, une montre de poche laissée par son frère est retournée en sa possession. À l'intérieur, il a trouvé un journal intime caché dans lequel on pouvait lire : "Le temps que tu entendes ceci, je serai déjà mort…".  
l'Obélisque, la Tour du Dieu Soleil, un monde où plusieurs univers et dimensions se croisent. Dans ce monde, son frère avait été victime d'une trahison en montant la tour. Après avoir appris la vérité, Yeon-woo décida d'escalader la tour avec le journal de son frère.  
Yeon-woo passe ensuite par les mêmes épreuves que son frère cadet et combat en tant que joueur anonyme. Son but ? Vaincre la Tour de l'Obélisque et venger son frère.
description.id: Setelah 5 tahun hilang, Cha Yeonwoo menemukan fakta bahwa adiknya, Cha Jungwoo, sudah meninggal. Ketika membongkar barang peninggalan adiknya, dia menemukan sebuah jam saku. Jam saku itu adalah hadiahnya untuk Jungwoo supaya lulus ujian. Begitu membuka jam tersebut, Cha Yeonwoo mendengar suara adiknya yang menceritakan kehidupannya selama 5 tahun ini. Ternyata Cha Jungwoo bukan hilang melainkan terdampar di dunia lain. Di dunia itu pula Cha Jungwoo dikhianati dan dibunuh. Mendengar itu, amarah Cha Yeonwoo bangkit. Dia berniat balas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Berbekal pengetahuan yang dia dapat dari Jungwoo, Cha Yeonwoo pun pergi ke dunia lain tersebut. Berhasilkah Cha Yeonwoo balas dendam?!
description.it:
Yeon-woo aveva un fratello gemello scomparso cinque anni fa…  
Un giorno, un orologio da tasca lasciato da suo fratello è tornato in suo possesso. Dentro, ha trovato un diario nascosto nel quale è stato registrato “Quando ascolterai questo, immagino che sarò già morto …”
description.ja: ある日豪の元に届いた双子の弟・駿の訃報。 虚無感を感じる彼の元に駿の懐中時計が届く。 そして豪はその中に隠された駿の日記によって、 駿が道半ばで力尽きた太陽神の塔・オベリスクへと誘われていく―。 弟の復讐に燃える豪が挑む、痛快アクションファンタジー！
description.ko:
5년 전 사라진 쌍둥이 동생을 잊고 살던 연우.
어느날 그에게 동생의 유품인 회중시계가 돌아왔다.

그리고 그 속에 숨겨진 일기장.

'형이 이 일기를 들을 때 즈음이라면 나는 이미 이 세상 사람이 아니겠지.'

여러 차원과 우주가 교차하는 세계에 놓인 태양의 신 탑, 오벨리스크.
그리고 그곳에 오르다 배신당해 눈을 감아야 했던 동생.

모든 걸 알게 된 연우는 동생이 남겨 둔 일기와 함께 탑을 오르기 시작한다.

'오늘부터 난. 차정우이다.'
description.ru:
Ёну в течение 5 лет жил, смирившись с исчезновением своего младшего брата-близнеца. Однажды ему в руки попали карманные часы его брата.​ Внутри них он обнаружил спрятанную записку.​ «Брат, если ты сейчас слушаешь эти записи, то меня уже нет на Земле». Узнав о том, что его младший брат отправился в Обелиск — башню богов, которая находится где-то в космосе на пересечении нескольких измерений, и был предан, Ёну решает отправиться туда сам.
«С этого момента я буду Ча Чонъу.​»
description.th: ชายอนอู ชายหนุ่มที่น้องชายหายตัวไป พร้อมกับต้องเสียแม่ไปเพราะโรคร้ายได้ ได้ตัดสินใจไปเป็นทหารอาสาสมัครที่ประเทศแอฟริกา จนอยู่มาวันนึงเขาได้ค้นพบความจริงว่า น้องชายของเขาได้หายตัวไปขณะกำลังตามหา 'ยาอายุวัฒนะ' ของอีกโลกหนึ่ง เพื่อนำมารักษาแม่ พร้อมกับถ่ายโอนพลังทิ้งไว้แก่เขา
description.tr: Yeon-woo’nun kardeşi beş yıl önce ortadan kaybolmuştur. Bir gün kardeşinden kalan bir cep saati eline geçer. İçinde, kardeşinin bırakmış olduğu gizli bir günlüğün olduğunu fark eder. ”Sen bunu bulduğunda, ben çoktan bu dünyadan göçmüş olacağım.” Obelisk, güneş tanrısının kulesi, farklı evrenler ve boyutların iç içe geçtiği bir dünyadır. Kardeşi, bu dünyada kuleye tırmanmaya çalışırken ihanete uğrayıp hayatını kaybetmiştir. Gerçeği öğrenmiş olan Yeon-woo, kardeşinin günlüğü ile birlikte kuleye tırmanmaya karar verir. ”Şu andan itibaren ben, Cha Jeong-woo’yum.”
description.zh-hk:
延宇選擇遺忘5年前消失的雙胞胎弟弟，
過上屬於自己的生活，
卻在某天收到了弟弟的遺物——懷錶。

而在那懷錶之中，還隱藏著弟弟的日誌。

「當哥聽見我的日誌時，
也代表我已經不在這個世界上了吧。」

方尖碑——各個次元與宇宙交會的太陽神之塔。

弟弟就是在攻塔過程中遭受背叛，不幸喪命。

於是，得知一切真相的延宇帶著弟弟留下的日誌，
踏上了攻塔之路!

altTitles.ja: ギャルせん

description.en: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
description.ja:
ドSギャルの体育教師に、俺が開発されていく‥‥っ！

高校に入学した宙＜そら＞の担任は、爆乳で超セクシーな黒ギャル教師。それは、初恋の清楚な隣のお姉さん・すずねの変わり果てた姿だった！日々エスカレートする先生の「教育的指導」。宙は今まで知らなかった快感に目覚めてしまい‥‥！？

description.en:
Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan, she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.   
  
Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.

The last thing Ellin remembers is having to deal with a belligerent customer at her dead-end job. And when she opened her eyes… she’s “Solhwa,” the beautiful fourth concubine to the king of the Xyaran Empire. Between trying to learn the language and eating steak, Ellin’s trying to figure exactly what’s going on. Where is she? How did this happen? And who can she trust: Solhwa’s handsome charismatic childhood friend or the elegant, raven-haired king’s advisor?

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

description.en: After facing off the last of the Otsutsuki clan members a forbidden seal activates on the last descendant’s body sending Naruto back into the past before his change began. Naruto is back in the academy with a few days remaining before the academy graduation exam. Naruto now has the opportunity to relive either as a loser who became the hero or awaken as a reborn genius that surpassed all his peers and changes the future.

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

title.en: The Legend of Dororo and Hyakkimaru

altTitles.ja: どろろと百鬼丸伝

altTitles.es-la: La Historia de Dororo y Hyakkimaru

description.en:
During Japan’s tumultuous Sengoku period, one man sells his son to a pack of devils in exchange for the power to rule. Forty-eight devils take forty-eight pieces of young Hyakkimaru, and the boy is left for dead. But through the assistance of a sage and a series of inventive prosthetics, Hyakkimaru survives. Together with the young thief Dororo, the now-grown Hyakkimaru embarks upon a quest to slay all the demons and retrieve the stolen pieces of his body.   
  
This classic story from Osamu Tezuka, the father of modern manga, is now reimagined in this gorgeous new adaptation by Satoshi Shiki.
description.ru: Голод, разруха, хаос. Крестьяне отдают последний рис самураям, которые ведут беспрерывные войны.Посреди этого ада на земле сошлись пути сироты и самопровозглашённого величайшего вора по имени Дороро и таинственного юноши с клинками вместо рук, Хяккимару, который бродит по свету, отыскивая и убивая демонов. Став невольным свидетелем одной из его битв, Дороро клянётся, что украдёт у Хяккимару эти клинки.Так начинается их путешествие.
description.es-la: Durante el complicado período Sengoku de Japón, un hombre vende a su hijo a una manada de demonios a cambio del poder de gobernar. Cuarenta y ocho demonios toman cuarenta y ocho piezas del joven Hyakkimaru, y el niño es dado por muerto. Pero gracias a la ayuda de un sabio doctor y una serie de ingeniosas prótesis, Hyakkimaru sobrevive. Junto con el joven ladrón Dororo, el ahora adulto Hyakkimaru se embarca en una misión para matar a todos los demonios y recuperar las piezas robadas de su cuerpo. Esta historia es un clásico de Osamu Tezuka, el padre del manga moderno, la cual ahora se reinventa en esta nueva y hermosa adaptación de Satoshi Shiki.

title.en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko

altTitles.ja: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子

altTitles.en: Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl

altTitles.th: โคฮารุกับมินาโตะ -แฟนของฉันเป็นผู้หญิง-

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

altTitles.ja: ロウヒーロー

description.en:
The unemployed Chiaki is the eldest of three brothers.  
With no parents, he starts job hunting to support his two younger brothers.  
Chiaki witnesses a young woman being sexually assaulted and tries to help, 
without knowing that this behavior would change his destiny.  


---
description.ru: Безработный молодой человек Чиаки является старшим братом в семье. Будучи без родителей, он начал поиски работы, чтобы поддержать двух младших братьев.И вот однажды, наконец, добившись финального собеседования, Чиаки стал свидетелем извращенца. Невольно попытавшись помочь, он даже не догадывался, что подобное поведение изменит его судьбу.
description.pt-br: Chiaki, um jovem desempregado, e o irmão mais velho dentre os 3 irmãos, sem pais, ele começou a procurar emprego para ajudar a sustentar seus dois irmãos mais novos. Um dia, quando finalmente consegue uma entrevista, Chiaki avista um pervertido e involuntariamente tenta ajudar sem saber que essa ação mudaria o seu destino drasticamente.

title.en: Otoko Girai na Bijin Shimai o Namae mo Tsugezu ni Tasuketara Ittai Dounaru?

altTitles.ja: 男嫌いな美人姉妹を名前も告げずに助けたら一体どうなる?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otoko Girai na Bijin Shimai wo Namae mo Tsugezu ni Tasuketara Ittai Dounaru?

altTitles.en: What Happens When You Save Two Beautiful Sisters Who Hate Men Without Telling Them Your Name?
The Case About Two Sisters Becoming Extremely Obsessed With Me After I Saved Them

altTitles.es-la: El caso de dos hermanas que se obsesionaron conmigo después de que las salvara

description.en:
Arisa and Aina are beautiful sisters who are famous for their dislike of men. Hayato, a classmate who happened to be involved with the two, will receive “special treatment” from the girls who are supposed to hate men―?! 

“I want to be a slave to Hayato-sama…”
“I want to fall in love and conceive his child.”
___
**Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)
description.ja:
男嫌いで有名な同級生の美人姉妹、亜利沙（ありさ）と藍那（あいな）。ひょんなことから2人に関わることになった隼人（はやと）は、男嫌いのはずの彼女たちから"特別扱い"を受けることにーー⁉︎

「隼人様に隷属したいの…」
「愛し合って彼の子供を孕みたいーー」
description.es-la: Arisa y Aina son unas hermosas compañeras de clase famosas por su aversión a los hombres. ¿¡Hayato, que se ha liado con ellas, recibirá un "trato especial" por parte de las chicas que se supone que odian a los hombres...?! ""Quiero ser esclava de Hayato-sama..."" Quiero enamorarme y concebir a su hijo"". ¡La tan esperada comicalización de la impredecible y rica comedia romántica ha comenzado!

title.en: Gate - Teikoku no Bara Kishidan - Pinya Co Lada 14-sai

altTitles.en: Gate - Piña's Rose Order of Knights
Gate - Rose Knights of the Empire - 14 Year Old Pinya Co Lada

altTitles.ja-ro: Gate - Teikoku no Bara Kishidan - Pinya Co Lada 14-sai

altTitles.ja: ゲート 帝国の薔薇騎士団 ピニャ・コ・ラーダ14歳

altTitles.zh-hk: 門 帝國之薔薇騎士團 平娜‧戈‧蘭達14歲

description.en: A spin-off focusing on Princess Pinya's (from "Gate - Thus the JSDF Fought There!") life before the "Gate" opening to the other world event.

altTitles.ja: 異世界サムライ

description.en:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
description.ja:
戦国時代最強の剣豪、異世界転移。

戦国時代末期、最強の剣豪・ギンコは常に、自分より強いものとの死闘に飢えていた。切って切って切りまくり、ついにこの世に自分以上の強者がいないと絶望した矢先、異世界へ転移！　目の前には――ドラゴン！？
description.pt-br:
A espadachim mais forte do período dos Reinos Combatentes, transferida para outro mundo.

No final do Período dos Reinos Combatentes, Ginko, a maior espadachim da época, estava sempre ansiosa por lutar até a morte com alguém mais forte que ela. Depois de cortar e cortar e cortar, ela finalmente se desespera porque não há ninguém mais forte do que ela neste mundo, e então ela é transferida para outro mundo! Diante de seus olhos está um dragão!

title.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Taster

altTitles.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Detector
I Will Become a Poison Detector in the Dark World
I Will Become a Poison Detector of Darkness

altTitles.zh: 完蛋！成了反派的试毒小跟班

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la detectora de veneno del Villano

description.en:
I, an innocent office worker, possessed a character in the devastating novel *The Poisoned Apple*. On top of that, I'm Giselle Lloydsvin, a villainess who gets poisoned to death before being hanged! But the poison brought by the assassins doesn't work? It even tastes like fruit!

"You'll be okay since it's only a little bit, so hurry and drink it."

…Even though I possessed someone, it seems my destiny is to be tormented by a crazy assassin. 

However, "Leniel", who I thought was just a crazy assassin, turns out to be the frontman for the final villain, "Wayne Ayore"?!

In order to hold onto this lifeline, I clung to the villain in *The Poisoned Apple*. 

"I can distinguish the taste of poison."

“Poison?”

“Yes.”

“What use is that?”

“Your boss is going to be poisoned, so I can be his poison taster.”

And so, I thought I could survive well as a general store employee of the villain’s frontman(?)... 

“My boss is so strong to the point that there’s something suspicious about him!”

…Why does it feel like I’m doomed in this life too?

title.en: Orc no Shuhai ni Shukufuku wo

altTitles.ja: オークの酒杯に祝福を

altTitles.en: The Half-Blood Orc in the Blended World

description.en: Half-Orc Elpis and Margit, the daughter of a corrupt nobleman, go on an adventure in search of WHISKEY, left behind by the teleporter Tanaka!
description.ja: そこは《酒》が魔法の魔力源となる世界。ハーフオークのエルピスは師である転移者タナカの遺した《ウィスキー》を求め、悪徳貴族の令嬢マルギットが世界を旅する！

altTitles.ja: カテナチオ

description.en: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
description.ja: 東條高校サッカー部に所属する嵐木八咫郎（あらきやたろう）の夢は欧州を制覇し、世界一になること。 高校3年の最後の試合、夢への第1歩、プロ入りを目指しスカウトの目に留まるため奮闘をするが―…。
description.vi: Yataro Araki là thành viên clb bóng đá trường cao trung Tojo. Cậu có ước mơ chinh phục đỉnh cao bóng đá Châu Âu trong 10 năm tới. Thời gian trôi qua, vào trận cuối cùng trước khi tốt nghiệp, và cũng là trận sẽ quyết định giấc mơ của cậu. Mọi thứ sẽ vô nghĩa nếu Araki không được tuyển trạch viên nào để ý đến, vì vậy cậu sẵn lòng làm tất cả mọi thứ, kể cả khi phải chơi bẩn để giành lấy chiến thắng. Nếu nó giúp cậu vươn đến đỉnh cao! Chào mừng đến với giới bóng đá quốc tế! Không tồn tại thứ gọi là bất khả xâm phạm hay luật lệ! Ít nhất là khi chiến thắng đang cận kề!
